basics.name: Vinitha Mahadevan
basics.label: Lead Release Train Engineer
basics.summary: Proven lead with experience in project/program/portfolio management and process improvements. Employs a systemic and proactive management style to drive results. Managed local, remote and offshore teams and successfully delivered projects. During my career I have implemented applications for Healthcare, manufacturing and logistics, retail and banking projects. My goal is to achieve a higher level of success in a management position where I can use my experience and my talents can be best served.Specialties include Project Management, Program Management, Employee Development, Release Processes, New System Implementation
